channel.title: [REQ] Penguins and Crystal keys
channel.description: Does anyone know a tutorial on adding Penguins that drop crystal keys for a chest? (Deathlypvpz v4 related recommended) I know this might be very simple to find one, but I can't fine one. Thanks :D

item.title: [REQ] Penguins and Crystal keys
item.dc:creator: @chazion chazion
item.description:
@chazion wrote:

add the drop for the penguins in npcdrops
then add some bs in itemonobject

something like

if(c.getItems().playerHasItem(###){
if(c.getItems.freeSlots > ##) {
c.getItems().deleteItem2(id, amount);
c.getItems().addItem(id, amount);
}
}

Read full topic
